metadata.title: CVE-2024-42280 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:mISDN: Fix a use after free in hfcmulti_tx()Don't dereference *sp after calling dev_kfree_skb(*sp).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-42280` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.11.0-7-generic - 6.11.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-7-generic - 6.11.0-7.7
linux-image-unsigned-6.11.0-7-generic-64k - 6.11.0-7.7
No subscription required

No subscription required
